question_content.description:
### Problem05

A general approach to implementing recursive programs, known as _____(0)\___ _____(1)\___, provides effective and elegant solutions to a wide class of problems. In _____(2)\___ (top-down/bottom-up) dynamic programming, we store or cache the result of each subproblem that we solve. In _____(3)\___ (top-down/bottom-up) dynamic programming, we compute solutions to all of the subproblems, starting with the "simplest" subproblems and gradually building up solutions to more and more complicated subproblems (from sec-2.3).

Excerpt From
Computer Science
Sedgewick, Robert,Wayne, Kevin
